messages.message: @lydia we now have a flag that let’s you run tests only during UAT (this is how the long-running NLP tasks are also tested). I would suggest making them unit tests (regression tests also work with this flag) following this: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/0f80df153da006ad1bf7ebed0fa5537f3e90885d/shared-utils/py-utils/test-utils/README.md
Maybe in the future we can also add a `uat` folder to the test suites?

@lydia — if they are tests that require spinning up multiple services (e.g., app-tasks calling doc-ops)  — i’d put that in the regression-test category

If it’s something which is completely self-contained to that service and you can test it’s functionality — i’d put it under unit-test (shouldn’t have any external service calls / no internet connection, etc)

Also — we have regression tests for api-server-apps, apps-server, but you can create as many of these regression tests as you like

You can go through the .mk files for how api-server-apps regression test works to spin up the appropriate services and then run your ML / image-processing regression test suite
